name: Devilery Corp.
description:
Description

Deliver package for your company Delivery Corp. Have fun, be underpaid....

Controls

-Move : turn clockwise right joystick

-Chose direction on corners : left joystick

-Do delivery : Maintain LT

-Use battery : Maintain RT

-Change battery mod : LB/RB

Context

Made for the AGBIC game jam.

Inspired by this cover from Viet 'Anh' Cao. Thank's to him!

Credits

@Etyen - Programmation / Art / Dialogues

@GigiChef - Game Design
